root.text:
#!/usr/bin/env escript
-module(main).
-export([main/1]).

% Generated by Mochi transpiler v0.10.34 (477186908) on 2025-07-21 20:06 +0700

main(_) ->
    People = [#{"name" => "Alice", "age" => 30}, #{"name" => "Bob", "age" => 15}, #{"name" => "Charlie", "age" => 65}, #{"name" => "Diana", "age" => 45}],
    Adults = [#{"name" => maps:get("name", Person), "age" => maps:get("age", Person), "is_senior" => (maps:get("age", Person) >= 60)} ||
        Person <- People,
        (maps:get("age", Person) >= 18)],
    io:format("~s~n", ["--- Adults ---"]),
    lists:foreach(fun(Person) ->
    io:format("~p ~s ~p ~s~n", [maps:get("name", Person), "is", maps:get("age", Person), (case (maps:get("is_senior", Person) /= nil) of
    true -> " (senior)";
    _ -> ""
end)])
end, Adults).
